name: Turning Point USA
description: Conservative youth organization focused on free markets and limited government.
platform: Promotes capitalism, constitutional values, and campus activism.

name: Sunrise Movement
description: Progressive climate justice movement led by young activists.
platform: Supports Green New Deal, climate action, and electoral organizing.

name: Moms for Liberty
description: Advocates for parental rights in education and local government.
platform: Focuses on school board accountability, curriculum transparency, and civic engagement.

name: Indivisible
description: Progressive grassroots network focused on resisting authoritarianism and building inclusive democracy.
platform: Supports progressive candidates, voting rights, and structural reform.

name: Heritage Action for America
description: Conservative policy advocacy group aligned with the Heritage Foundation.
platform: Advocates for limited government, free enterprise, and traditional values.

name: MoveOn
description: Progressive advocacy group mobilizing voters and promoting social justice.
platform: Focuses on healthcare, climate, democracy reform, and economic equity.

name: FreedomWorks
description: Libertarian-conservative group promoting small government and individual liberty.
platform: Supports tax reform, deregulation, and grassroots organizing.

name: Black Lives Matter Global Network
description: Movement advocating for racial justice and police accountability.
platform: Focuses on systemic racism, community investment, and civil rights.

name: Center for Popular Democracy
description: Progressive network of community organizations focused on equity and justice.
platform: Supports economic justice, immigrant rights, and democratic reform.

name: Tea Party Patriots
description: Grassroots conservative group advocating for fiscal responsibility and constitutional government.
platform: Focuses on limited government, free markets, and personal liberty.
